mapper.insert: insert into user (id, username, password, chineseName, school, institute, major, qq, phone, mail, address, isAdmin, refreshCnt, registerTime, round) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chinesename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{institute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isadmin,jdbcType=BIT}, #{refreshcnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{round,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chineseName = #{chinesename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, institute = #{institute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isAdmin = #{isadmin,jdbcType=BIT}, refreshCnt = #{refreshcnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, registerTime = #{registertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, round = #{round,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, chineseName, school, institute, major, qq, phone, mail, address, isAdmin, refreshCnt, registerTime, round from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, username, password, chineseName, school, institute, major, qq, phone, mail, address, isAdmin, refreshCnt, registerTime, round from user
